examples: Oedicladium pseudorufescens (Hampe) B.C.Tan & Mohamed, Bryologist 91: 32. 1988 (B example); Selaginella antimonanensis B.C.Tan & Jermy, Fern Gaz. 12(3): 170. 1981 (P example)
